mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TeamBoard (MemberID, TeamCode, Content, Title) VALUES ( #{memberid},#{teamcode},#{content},#{title})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM teamboard tb JOIN teams t ON tb.teamcode = t.teamcode WHERE tb.postid = #{postid};
mapper.update: update teamboard set Title = #{title}, Content = #{content} where memberid = #{memberid} and postid = #{postid}
mapper.delete: delete from teamboard where postid = #{postid} and memberid = #{memberid};
mapper.update: update teamboard set views = views + 1 where postid = #{postid};
mapper.insert: insert into comments (memberid, postid, commentindex, content) values ( #{memberid},#{postid},#{commentindex},#{content})
